Software Development

InfoPrima is a company with personnel who have years of experience in real business software solution development. Development range from small network with MS Access database (mdb) with multi users access it, or MS SQL server (mdf) as back end and MS Access as front end, or much larger network with MS SQL or DB2/400 as back end and distributed application using PHP server script and browser for front end. 

On the high-end side, we provide web development service to companies with IBM i (aka AS/400) as their main platform, using Python/Django or PHP/Zend Framework to boost IBM i applications presence to the web.


Our solution will benefit government bodies, profit/non-profit  organizations or academic institutions in Indonesia, that need application which works for their field   workers/members who deal with online  information while they are on the road.

 

Tell us what you need, We do have the solution.


IT Consultancy

We provide knowledge management service to your team collaboration purpose. From planning, design and implementation of solution using close source such as Microsoft Sharepoint or using an extended version of open source framework of Drupal / Joomla. The solution is based on your requirement and your team goal.
 
Your requirement also in need of reliable messaging system, we can provide them for you.
We are also provide service for integrating your existing IT infrastructure or build new IT strategy. Ranging from selection of hardware to operating systems and application software.

Such as government development project, we can provide consultancy in Document Management System, utilizing Windows SharePoint services, which benefit the organization to achieve team collaboration goal and as information sharing portal.
InfoPrima helps organizations implement customized SharePoint solutions, migrate existing data files and information to SharePoint portals and sites, and provide links and access to external information and applications. With our support, users in organizations can collaborate, store, search, manage, and access information using a centralized portal environment, customized to meet their needs.

Open Source Initiative

Like it or not, big players in IT industries such as IBM, SUN etc is seriously supporting Open Source as their business niche, even Microsoft consider Open Source  as their challenge. Companies who act cleverly can benefit from adapting Open Source in supporting their business objective. And where InfoPrima can help such companies reach this plan. Ranging form plain back end implementation such as MySql, PHP, Postfix  messaging system, to web 2.0 UI framework with extended Drupal / Joomla to boost your presence in world wide web.




Infoprima offers an open-source consulting service which allows you to leverage our experience with open-source software systems to benefit your organization. We have experience in creating system configurations with centralized management and high degrees of failure tolerance while maintaining system security. We have the skill set to modify and/or extend existing open-source software to fit your needs.
